channel.title: Launched today: ProductChart.com - Interactive Comparison Charts
channel.description:
http://www.ProductChart.com
This has been brewing as a side project since March last year when I first did a chart of the 200 most popular flash drives. Called it "The tourist map of flashdrives" at that time. Added more products and the interactive filters later in the year. Every time it got good responses and even some press outlets picked it up.
So I decided to turn this into a full fledged project on its own this year. Got a proper domain name and made a homepage for it. So here it is. ProductChart.com!
Mission statement: For every product type, provide a nice overview of what is available in the market, plus the filters to choose the perfect product.
Feedback would be very welcome. I still have to decide if I brand it as "Product Chart", "ProductChart" or "ProductChart.com". Any opinions?
